infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Nooks requires access to your camera to let you add pictures to post to your social media channels
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Nooks needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload images. Your images will not be shared without your permission
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Nooks needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload images. Your images will not be shared without your permission
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Nooks requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you your current location
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Nooks requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you your current location
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Nooks requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you your current location
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Nooks requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & show you your current location
